director.name: 马努索斯·马诺萨基斯 Manousos Manousakis

introduction: Alexandros Papadiamantis’ short story of the same title "comes to life" conveying to us the ambiance and mood of another era, in mid-19th century.The short story tells the story of 50-year-old Skevo. When she hears that her son (Stavros), who works on a ship as boatswain in order to earn enough money to ask his beloved Rinio to marry him, is sick, Skevo disguises herself as a man and becomes a “vardian” (guard) at “sporka” (ships that were quarantined because of cholera), in order to save him.
